      Methods in com.notification with parameters of type Notification 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void NotificationListener.actionCompleted(Notification notification, java.lang.String action)
      Called when an action is completed on the Notification (e.g., a click).
      void NotificationManager.addNotification(Notification note, Time time)
      Adds a Notification and will also make it visible.
      void NotificationManager.removeNotification(Notification note)
      Removes a Notification and will also hide it.

    • Uses of Notification in com.notification.types

      Subclasses of Notification in com.notification.types 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AcceptNotification
      This is a Notification that will ask the user to accept of decline a certain action.
      class  BorderLayoutNotification
      Lays out Swing Components in a BorderLayout.
      class  IconNotification
      An IconNotification displays text, but with an icon.
      class  ProgressBarNotification 
      class  TextNotification
      A text notification which will display a title and a subtitle.
      class  WindowNotification
      A Notification which displays in a JWindow, handles click events, and allows subclasses to supply a JPanel.
